## BootstrapPopoverDirective class

Directive applies (bootstrap) jQuery popover on all elements which have popover attribute specified.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BootstrapPopoverDirective implements AfterViewInit, OnDestroy 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(element, platformId)](./bootstrap-core.bootstrappopoverdirective._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>BootstrapPopoverDirective</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [contentPosition](./bootstrap-core.bootstrappopoverdirective.contentposition.md) |  | <code>BootstrapPlacement</code> | Gets or sets popover placement location valid values (top, bottom, left, right, auto) |
|  [contentSelector](./bootstrap-core.bootstrappopoverdirective.contentselector.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Gets or sets popover HTML content CSS selector |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [ngAfterViewInit()](./bootstrap-core.bootstrappopoverdirective.ngafterviewinit.md) |  | Called when view was initialized |
